articles.title: Xbox console games are suddenly showing up inside the Xbox PC app - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft has started showing Xbox console games inside the Xbox PC app. It’s part of Microsoft’s ongoing work to bring Xbox and Windows closer together.

articles.title: The Mustang’s New Appearance Pack Is a 1980s Fever Dream - Motor1.com
articles.description: Ford is launching a new appearance package for the 2026 Mustang that takes inspiration from the third-generation Fox Body. See how it looks here.

articles.title: Season 3 Perfect Parry change has big implications for C. Viper in Street Fighter 6 - EventHubs
articles.description: We spoke before Season 3 came out about how big the changes to the game's Perfect Parry mechanic would be for people who are strong at crossup attacks, and now that this season's DLC character lineup is known ...

articles.title: Princess Peach's Voice Actor Has Been Replaced After 18 Years - Nintendo Life
articles.description: She was also the voice of Toad

articles.title: Bill Atkinson, Macintosh Pioneer and Inventor of Hypercard, Dies at 74 - WIRED
articles.description: Atkinson’s gleeful brilliance helped people draw on computer screens and access information via links.
